short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TimezoneDB is an easy, cross-platform method of keeping track of others' timezones.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TimezoneDB adds timezone information to the linked accounts of its registered users, in order to streamline long distance communications across the internet

New in 0.0.3:
- Customize your time display format
- Discord messages now use the message creation timestamp
